alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 05 at 3:08AM MDT until November 06 at 5:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North. * WHEN...Until 4 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Travelers on seasonal routes such as Monte Cristo and over Sardine, Logan and Daniels Summits should be prepared for deteriorating conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds are expected to result in reduced visibilities in blowing and drifting snow through Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
